channel.title: Stats for R00t missions
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Stats for R00t missions" - stats needed to complete the 35D/40S missions in R00t

item.title: Re: Stats for R00t missions
item.content:encoded: oh wow, thanks. i will give it a try to see if i can figure it out.

item.title: Re: Stats for R00t missions
item.content:encoded: You can figure it out for yourself far easier than we can guess what you need. There are two Mission Calculators listed in the toolbar under Utilities that you can use to help figure it out..

item.title: Stats for R00t missions
item.content:encoded: okay so in R00t I have to complete 35D/40S in Gen, Nin and Tai. what kind of stats (level, range, strength, success) should i make sure I have before I know I have a chance of satisfying these missions? Thanks.
